key_risks: Financial stability concerns due to profitability challenges and high debt levels
Intense market competition from established technology providers and fintech disruptors
Supply chain vulnerabilities exacerbated by geopolitical tensions and COVID-19 impacts
Cybersecurity risks as a prime target for cyberattacks
Ethical and social concerns related to cybersecurity threats
controversies: High debt levels and financial performance under scrutiny
Supply chain disruptions impacting production and delivery timelines
Potential reputational damage from cybersecurity breaches
social_issues: Cybersecurity threats and the need for robust security measures
governance_issues: Leadership changes aimed at driving innovation and growth
Cost optimization and restructuring programs to improve operational efficiency
